class_notes: Online with synchronous sessions TBD. On campus intensives TBD.
course_description: This course is designed to introduce assessment and clinical reasoning skills. Family Nurse Practitioner students will develop competence in diagnosis and management of common health conditions across the lifespan. Emphasis on common conditions commonly encountered within primary care.
prerequisites: NRSG 538D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2558, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Leppke, Status: Open
